name: compify-monorepo
description: Compify MVP - Competition website with monorepo architecture

scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm run dev:static" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:sandbox"
scripts.dev:static: npm run build-integration && cd apps/web-static && npm run dev
scripts.dev:backend: npm run copy-design-system && cd apps/backend && go run cmd/main.go
scripts.dev:sandbox: npm run copy-design-system && cd apps/sandbox && npm run dev
scripts.build:all: npm run build:static && npm run build:backend && npm run build:sandbox
scripts.build:static: npm run build-integration && cd apps/web-static && npm run build
scripts.build:backend: npm run copy-design-system && cd apps/backend && go build -o ../../dist/backend ./cmd
scripts.build:sandbox: npm run copy-design-system && cd apps/sandbox && npm run build
scripts.install:all: npm run install:static && npm run install:sandbox
scripts.clean: rm -rf dist && cd apps/web-static && rm -rf dist && cd ../sandbox && rm -rf dist
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:integration
